description: Overview*3D-Support: True 3D for gaming and home theater*4K-Support: Video Resolutions up to 4096 x 2048*HDMI Ethernet Channel(HEC): Full-duplex 100 Mbps Ethernet*Audio Return Channel(ARC): Transfers audio in both directions*Content Type Support: Auto-selects the mode to match the content for games, videos, photos, or text*Color Spaces: Deep Color up to 16 bits per channel (48 bit color depths RGB or YCbCr)Important NoteCheck your device! This is not a Mini-HDMI cableThe HDMI Ethernet Channel only functions on HEC enabled devices.Specifications* Input: Micro-HDMI Typ C 19 pin - Male* Output: HDMI Typ A 19 pin - Male* Supports DVD Audio, SACD, TrueHD and DTS-HD* Supports 225MHz/2.25 Gbps per channel (6,75 Gbps all channels) and up to 340 MHz (10.2 Gbps) Bandwidth* Supports uncompressed digital LPCM 7.1, 5.1* 100% Bare Copper Conductors (No CCS)* Wire Gauge: 30 AWG* RoHS compliantCompatibility (Incomplete List)* Any device with Micro (Typ D) HDMI* Amazon Kindle Fire HD 8.9", HD 7" (only 2012),Not HDX* Asus Transformer Prime* Acer Iconia Tab A100* Blackberry Playbook* Coby Kyros MID1026 Tab* Dell Streak 5* HTC EVO 4G* Kodak Z5120 , PLAYSPORT Video Camera* Lenovo K1 Ideapad* Motorola Atrix 4G, Motorola Droid X, Motorola Xoom Tab* LG UX10, Optimus* Fuji FinePix F85EXR* Olympus XZ-1 Olympus Stylus 5010, 7040, 9010* Panasonic DMC-TS4, DMC-FX90K* Sony Tab S, Xperia ion/S/TL, WX150, TX66, TX200V* Toshiba AT200* Viewsonic ViewPad 7e* Vizio 8" Tab
title: Cable Matters High Speed Micro HDMI Cable in Black with Ethernet 15 ft - 3D and 4K Resolution Ready
